## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2e1af1d02505f4566c424f21a111d21aab14a0af46e04316c0c84bd47c35a777)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'eslint-config-ivy' @ 99.99.992 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
